ygData.subject: Re: Exploring the windmills
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually on the thought that someone said the gm claimed all the information was at the mills, I coaxed a lvl 49 druid to take out all of the npc s at the
ygData.messageBody:
Actually on the thought that someone said the gm claimed all the information
was at the mills, I coaxed a lvl 49 druid to take out all of the npc's at the
mills even the merchents for me as I healed him with my druid 8) they were
very tough and we had to zone once as things went awry and we were both
attacked by the guard there, they dropped nothing... nothing at all.... I
cried that night... hard thinking I might have our answer and then come up
empty. However, I have never seen Feddie Dooger and dont know about him.....
charlotte was tough but not as tough as the npc with the elemental pet... he
was nasty .... just so we can rule out a drop, unless it is a rare drop.
That my friends would suk.
